summary: About an aspiring author who wakes up from a 27-year coma as one of his country's finest authors, credited for a book he didn't write.
cast: In-soo Kim|Shin-Hyo Kang|Seong-Hwan Kyeong|Kim Jeong-pal|Jong-ryol Choi|Jae-hye Lee|Min-Kyoung Seo|Kyong-mi Lee|Sang-mi Kim|Min-Jeong Park|Soo-Kyeong Noh|Yoo-Mi Lee|Bit-na Lee|Chang-gyu Kil|Seong-Kyoo Yang|Hyeon-ho Lee|Jeong-sik Seo|Myeong-hyo Choi|Hee-hee Shin|Do-Youn Lee|Kyoe-tat Lee|Sang-ah Park|Han-ah Jo|Je-Youn Jaon|Very Kim|Hoon-hee Cheoung
title: Reoshian soseol
